original_title: Devon's Ghost: Legend of the Bloody Boy
overview: A serial killer terrorizes the  horror-stricken town of Canyon City. Plagued by a 10-year-old tale of the mysterious murder of Devon Anderson, this community still harbors curiosity when the current victims - and the evidence surrounding their murders - appear to be very similar to what happened to Devon and the parents accused of killing him. Did Devon die? Convinced Devon is alive - and the killer - a group of teens set off to find and stop him from murdering again. Staying one step ahead of the authorities, they find out the killer is too smart and too strong running is not an option. They must fight to escape the killer's wrath and get one step closer to answering the legend and mystery that surrounds that fateful night.
title: Devon's Ghost: Legend of the Bloody Boy
